personal.name: Alejandro Pérez
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.bio: I am a Senior Software Engineer with 20+ years of field experience, currently specializing in distributed systems and AI technologies. I combine technical expertise with analytical curiosity, grounded in strong software engineering principles. I've been building software since I was 8 years old, so I feel incredibly fortunate to have turned a childhood passion into a fulfilling career. For me, coding isn't just work; it's a craft I continuously pursue. When not building software, I find clarity through yoga, meditation, chess, and outdoor adventures—practices I leverage to empower my day-to-day working activities.

experience.title: Technical Leader
experience.subtitle: XalDigital.com
experience.description: Leading technical strategy and development for AI/ML and IoT projects serving enterprise clients across multiple industries.
details: Designed a computer vision application for quality control for an international manufacturing company.
Designed and collaborated on building a real-time video analysis application for a major video streaming company.

experience.title: Software Architect
experience.subtitle: System73.com
experience.description: Promoted to lead architect of the P2P streaming platform and while managed a development team of 20+ software developers.
details: Led technical standards implementation across development teams.
Designed evolution of microservices architecture. Extended platform capabilities to support real time video analytics.

experience.title: Backend Software Developer
experience.subtitle: System73.com
experience.description: Served as an early team member and lead backend developer for an innovative P2P live video streaming platform start-up.
details: Built distributed backend microservices architecture capable of handling thousands of concurrent video streams.
Developed AWS-based infrastructure for stream management, and real-time data analytics.

experience.title: Fisheries Information Systems Specialist
experience.subtitle: IATTC
experience.description: Developed and maintained scientific computing applications for the IATTC, supporting international fisheries research.
details: Converted Length-Frequency and Species Composition Estimation programs from FORTRAN to a data pipeline using SQL stored procedures.
Contributed to the development of the FAO's Global Record of Fishing Vessels.

experience.title: Systems Administrator
experience.subtitle: IEO - Spanish Institute of Oceanography
experience.description: Managed IT infrastructure and provided technical support for the IEO's research operations.
details: Administered Windows servers, ensuring high availability and security for research applications.
Updated IEO - COC Server infrastructure to Windows Server 2000, enhancing performance and security.

education.title: Master in Computer Science
education.subtitle: University of La Laguna (ULL)
education.description: MSc in Computation specialized in Artificial Intelligence. Graduated with distinction (2nd in class).

education.title: BSc Computer Science - Systems Engineering
education.subtitle: University of La Laguna (ULL)
education.description: Comprehensive foundation in computer science fundamentals and software engineering principles.

projects.title: MCP - Weather Service for LLMs
projects.subtitle: Historical EUMETSAT Datasets + Google's GraphCast AI vs ECMWF's AIFS Weather Forecasts
projects.description: Weather data service that integrates EUMETSAT historical satellite data with Google GraphCast and AIFS forecasts through the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for next weather prediction for LLM models

projects.title: Tuna Fisheries Data Exploration Tools
projects.subtitle: Catch and Effort Data and Purse seine Geospatial Data
projects.description: A comprehensive data exploration and analysis project focused on fisheries data, utilizing Python for data compilation a frontend based on vanilla JS, css and html

projects.title: PyADMB - Python Wrapper for ADMB
projects.subtitle: ADMB (Automatic Differentiation Model Builder) Python Wrapper
projects.description: A modern Python interface for AD Model Builder (ADMB), bringing automatic differentiation and advanced optimization to fisheries stock assessment and ecological modeling.
